name: Good Mourning
description: Follows London Clash, a movie star whose world is turned upside down when he must choose between pursuing his one true love and landing a life-changing, starring role in a major motion picture.

review.author: VanWizzle
review.heading: Terrible
review.reviewBody: Only watched cause my gf asked me to. She's currently on an mgk kick for reasons I can't explain. The only reason I gave this a 2 was for the notable good actors and actresses that appeared throughout the movie. Mgk acts as well as he sings? Raps? I don't know what you call what it is he does, but this is terrible and easily the worst thing I've ever had to endure.

keywords: showbiz comedy,love,f word,reference to batman,reference to google
